front.title: Problem statement of Inter-domain Traffic Redirection Risks

abstract.t: Redirection of network traffic on the Internet is a common technology. In operator network, there are comlex scenarios, such as multi-domain interconnection and large scale network topology. If reliability and effectiveness of traffic redirection technology are artificially guaranteed, there would be risks, such as traffic detour, traffic exposure, traffic black hole and traffic loops. This draft describes these risks.
